name: 14.11-Fastx tool kit: FASTA-Q renamer
description: Renames the sequence identifiers in FASTQ/A file

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: FASTA/Q input file. default is STDIN

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: FASTA/Q output file. default is STDOUT

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: rename type: SEQ - use the nucleotides sequence as the name. COUNT - use simply counter as the name
